scripts.hosting: pm2 install typescript && cross-env NODE_ENV=withoutDB pm2 start 'ts-node src/bin/start.ts' --name \"DENESOR\" -o ./api.log -e ./api.log --merge-logs  -i 1
scripts.hosting2: pm2 install typescript && pm2 delete DENESOR && cross-env NODE_ENV=withoutDB pm2 start 'ts-node src/bin/start.ts' --name \"DENESOR\" -o ./api.log -e ./api.log --merge-logs  -i 1
scripts.through: npm run clear && tsc && cross-env NODE_ENV=withoutDB node dist/bin/start.js
